Title: Extends the expiration of provisions relating to the estate tax treatment of dispositions for certain surviving spouses
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of the estate tax treatment of dispositions to surviving spouses who are not United States citizens to July 1, 2028.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 538 of the laws of 2013, amending the tax law relating to the estate tax treatment of dispositions to surviving spouses who are not United States citizens, in relation to extending the expiration of the provisions thereof
